start.title: The Crossroads
start.storyText: You stand at a crossroads, where two paths diverge. To your left, a dark forest looms, whispering with shadows. To your right, a mysterious cave entrance beckons, its mouth glowing with an unknown light. Which path do you choose?

forest_start.title: The Whispering Woods
forest_start.storyText: You step into the woods, the trees closing in around you. A strange, rustling sound makes you jump, and you decide to run deeper into the undergrowth.

choices.text: Follow the sound of a nearby river
Hide behind a large oak tree

river_path.title: The Peaceful Riverbank
river_path.storyText: The river leads you out of the dense forest to a tranquil village. Its inhabitants seem welcoming, and you feel a sense of hope.

hide.title: Hiding in the Shadows
hide.storyText: You hide behind a massive oak, your heart pounding. The sound fades, and you realize the coast is clear. You have overcome your initial fear and are ready to face the forest again.

find_food.title: A Fortunate Find
find_food.storyText: You search for hours and discover a cluster of wild berries. You eat just enough to regain your strength and feel ready to continue your journey.

choices.text: Continue your journey through the forest

rest.title: Taking a Moment
rest.storyText: You lie down to rest, but you know you can't fall asleep here. You must find your way home.

choices.text: Stand up and continue your journey
You feel too tired to move

village_discovery.title: Finding a Friend
village_discovery.storyText: You're welcomed into the village and immediately befriend a kind local who offers you a place to stay. You've found a new home and a valuable friendship.

job_search.title: A New Beginning
job_search.storyText: You find honest work at a farm. The days are long, but you learn the value of hard work and feel a sense of purpose. You know this is the first step toward a successful life.

cave_start.title: The Glimmering Cave
cave_start.storyText: You enter the cave, and a faint glow grows brighter with every step. You discover a trove of ancient coins and jewels! This is a tremendous stroke of luck.

choices.text: Search for the exit with your treasure
Leave the cave and return to the crossroads

cave_exit.title: The Winding Tunnel
cave_exit.storyText: The tunnel to the outside is long and confusing. You get turned around, but you refuse to give up, knowing your treasure is worth the risk.

choices.text: Turn back and look for another way

dead_end.title: A New Path
dead_end.storyText: You hit a dead end, but you're not defeated. You've learned that sometimes in life, you have to turn back and try a new direction. You forge ahead with renewed determination.

choices.text: Continue your journey with your riches

give_up.title: The End of the Road
give_up.storyText: Exhausted and defeated, you decide to give up. The journey is too hard. But the game, and life, will always be waiting for you to try again.

win.title: A Victorious Life
win.storyText: You have succeeded in your journey. Whether through friendship, hard work, or a bit of luck, you've found what you were looking for. Congratulations, you are a true winner!
